analytic.title: New Fragments of the Original Syriac Translation of the Mythological Scholia of Ps.-Nonnos to the Orations of Gregory Nazianzen

biblStruct.note: The Orations of Gregory Nazianzen were widely read and studied in the Syriac milieu. Four of those Orations were often transmitted together with the mythological scholia of Ps.-Nonnos, which were translated into Syriac in the sixth century and revised in the seventh. Only fragments of the original version survive. The present article presents a further set of previously unpublished fragments from a Sinai manuscript.

body.bibl: King, Daniel. “New Fragments of the Original Syriac Translation of the Mythological Scholia of Ps.-Nonnos to the Orations of Gregory Nazianzen.” Le Muséon 135:1-2 (2022): 29–45. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.2143/MUS.135.1.3290650.
